The Lady Vols lose to Georgia at Thompson Boling Arena on Oct PERIOD   PERIOD

The Tennessee Lady Vols volleyball team took down the No PERIOD  Missouri Tigers  in five sets      in the spring season opener Friday to improve to  on the year PERIOD

The Lady Vols snapped No PERIOD  Missouris six game win streak that dated back to the fall season while Tennessee extended its win streak to three PERIOD

Tennessee was led by Lily Felts who notched her seventh consecutive doubledigit kill streak with  PERIOD On top of this Felts also recorded  digs solidifying a four game streak with a doubledouble that dates back to November of last season PERIOD

 Coach Eve Rackham said PERIOD

Set four seemed to tell the same story early PERIOD Mizzou jumped out to an  lead needing just seven more points to win the match before Lily Felts took over PERIOD The Knoxville native posted her best set of the day leading the team all the way back to a  set four win after a coaches challenge solidified Felts final attack point PERIOD

Set five was a race to  and Tennessee was up to the challenge PERIOD The Lady Vols and Tigers started the set trading points before Tennessee eventually pulled away to take a  lead following a kill by Ava Bell PERIOD Lily Felts tallied three of the final four points needed to reach  which rewarded the Lady Vols their first victory of the spring season  PERIOD The Lady Vols finished with a hitting percentage of . and are now  on the season when hitting better than . as a team PERIOD

We get to celebrate until  oclock Mahaffey said PERIOD we got two and a half hours then its on to the next game PERIOD We won but we have to be able to do it again

The Lady Vols look to complete the sweep of the Tigers Saturday at  PM ET at ThompsonBoling arena PERIOD You can catch Tennessee on SEC Network  PERIOD
